{"id":398581268,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"2 years, 11 months","timestamp":1600660164,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"56 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/398581268/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"14.6 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def trap(self, height: List[int]) -> int:\n        l, r = 0, len(height) - 1\n        l_max, r_max = 0, 0\n        ans = 0\n        # 只要l_max < r_max, 计算左边时那么就一定不用担心右边会没人给拦着\n        # 同理，只要r_max < l_max, 计算右边时就不用担心左边没人给拦着\n        while l < r:\n            if height[l] > l_max:\n                l_max = height[l]\n            if height[r] > r_max:\n                r_max = height[r]\n            if l_max < r_max:\n                # 放心计算左边\n                ans += max(0, l_max - height[l])\n                l += 1\n            else:\n                # 放心计算右边\n                ans += max(0, r_max - height[r])\n                r -= 1\n        return ans","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
